mainEntity.name: How does Nerlude keep my credentials secure?

acceptedAnswer.text: Nerlude uses AES-256 encryption to protect all stored credentials. Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We're SOC 2 ready and GDPR compliant.
Nerlude supports 100+ popular services including AWS, Stripe, Vercel, MongoDB, SendGrid, Sentry, and many more. You can also add custom services for any tool not in our library.

mainEntity.name: Can I collaborate with my team on Nerlude?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! Nerlude supports team collaboration with role-based access control. You can invite team members as Owners, Admins, Members, or Viewers with different permission levels.
Nerlude automatically sends you reminders 30, 14, 7, and 1 day before any subscription renews. You can customize these intervals and receive notifications via email or Slack.
Yes, Nerlude offers a REST API for programmatic access to your data, webhooks for real-time event notifications, and integrations with Zapier and Slack.
Nerlude is designed for solo founders, indie hackers, startup teams, and small businesses who need to manage multiple SaaS subscriptions across their projects.
